
  // ----------------------------------------------------
  // User name (OS): Justin (win)
  // Date and time: 05/7/13, 14:41:12
  // ----------------------------------------------------
  // Method: silly_method
  // Description
  //
  // This method doesn't do anything useful!
  //
  // Parameters
  // @param boolean truthy
  // ----------------------------------------------------

C_BOOLEAN($0;$1;$truthy)
C_BOOLEAN($falsy)

$falsy:=True
$truthy=Not($falsy) & $falsy

$0:=$falsy | $truthy | True | False
